alert.note: Alert for McDonald; Newton (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 3:28AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN NEWTON AND WESTERN MCDONALD COUNTIES THROUGH 415 AM CDT... At 327 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles southeast of Wyandotte to South West City. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Airport Observation. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Anderson, Noel, Dodge, Goodman, South West City, Pineville, Lanagan, Cayuga and Tiff City. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 1 and 18. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
